I have a few T204 available, including some HOFers. Prices below include priority shipping and insurance for cards over $250. Scans can be seen in this gallery: 

[url]http://jalbum.net/browse/user/album/733150/[/url]

Brown PSA 4 (MK) $900
Tenney SGC 30 SOLD

Responses via email take precedence over responses here.

Email: [url]semloh00@yahoo.com[/url]

Checks, money orders and paypal fine. 

Ray

Tenney sold. As of Sunday morning, most of the cards have been moved over to ebay (username semloh00)...feel free to make an offer.

Ray
